title: is the server down?
body: i have been trying to log on and play but when i do there is a red message on the log on screan that says i cant log on because im not connected to the internet, and that if i am connected to load the legacy client instead. when i do that there is a message that says im either not online or my firewall is blocking access. since im am online and my firewall isnt blocking access, im wondering if the server is actually up and running

replies.body:
Server is up; Repair the client, it should fix your problem.
I had that problem before, i think my files was corrupted or something, i repaired it and it worked.
